title: What is the reward of praying Fajr & Isha in congregation? | AssimAlHakeem -JAL
transcript: says what is the reward of praying fajr and isha in congregation the prophet said in an authentic hadith whoever praised risha in congregation allah would reward him as if he prayed half of the night night prayer and whoever prays fajr in congregation allah would reward him as if he prayed the whole night night prayer you
